title: ILinearPatternFeatureData.D2EndRefReverseOffset
description: Gets or sets whether to reverse the offset from the up-to-reference geometry in Direction 2 of this bidirectional linear pattern feature.
returns: True to reverse ILinearPatternFeatureData::D2EndRefOffset from ILinearPatternFeatureData::D2EndReference , false to not
remarks:
This property is valid only if
ILinearPatternFeatureData::D2EndCondition
is set to
swPatternEndCondition_e
.swPatternEndCondition_UpToReference.
